body:
Hello Avicus!

Due to popular request today we are implementing custom forum mentioning which should be very easy and user-comprehensive. How it works? As said it's very simple and works as explained below:


{tag=28889c74f739437287a8b965cd5f9d65} = 


What this will do:

  • Format the mention
  • Ping the mentioned user
  • Name-change proof
  • Rank-colored

    • Regards,
    {tag=28889c74f739437287a8b965cd5f9d65}
body_tagged:
Hello Avicus!

Due to popular request today we are implementing custom forum mentioning which should be very easy and user-comprehensive. How it works? As said it's very simple and works as explained below:


Javipepe = 


What this will do:

  • Format the mention
  • Ping the mentioned user
  • Name-change proof
  • Rank-colored

    • Regards,
    Javipepe
